name: R-CUBE Lite
description:
-You can play only 10 stages in the Lite version.

- It is a puzzle game where you pick up the seal to roll the cube, to stamp the goal.
-Cube can be rolled back and forth from side to side swipe and flick.

-All switches operate by sliding laterally.

-When you press the seal in the cube, is transferred to the surface (bottom surface) I stepped. In addition, it is transferred to the surface of the opposite side (upper surface).
-There is a "circle", "square", "cross" each of the types of goals and seal.
-Please be stamped with the seal of the same shape goal. It is clear and stamped on all goal.

-Cubes do nothing different in terms of stepping on the seal with a sticker.
-Seal surface and the upper surface of the stamp to the goal disappears. The surface can be transferred to another new seal.

-Go back one step in the "UNDO" switch (up to 10 steps).
-Switching ON / OFF of the sound, reset, exit from the OPTION switch done.
